389530.name: Garlock Online
389530.description:
About the game Go on a trip to Garlock Online. Collect points, fight numerous monsters, and gain power throughout the game. In Garlock you can choose between different character types and improve them with items as well as armor during the game. Each character has its own level system. Keep your characters in good health to ensure their longevity and help them climb the dungeons together. Rise in level and become stronger than your opponent battles against other players in Epic PVP battles. Garlock Online is a PvP game but also a Singlplayer was integrated with.




It is now time, we have changed the whole game once more and have come to a denominator.
We realize that game will remain long in the early access.
We could not decide what game we wanted to develop, a shooter or an RPG? We wondered why we did not combine both to a new game concept that was us

Still not enough so we decided to have the game run online so the player can share the experience gained with friends. Nevertheless, there are still some details, which is where we need you. Join us and become a part of the Garlock online community

With Garlock online, we would like to introduce you to a new game,
Play in Garlock Online exciting missions, chase monsters or take part in epic battles.


  • colorful graphics
  • a wide range of different raids
  • easier and faster progress

Fight on the side of your friends or even against them!
Help other players have fun in the game
Collect Battle Marks to unlock epic armor and new battles
389530.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
